0.0.1.name: wordpress/responsive-twentyten
0.0.1.description: Makes your TwentyTen themed site have a responsive and fluid layout. Making it ideal for for viewing across a whole range of devices and screen sizes (i.e iPhones, Android, iPads). Uses CSS and media queries to enable the fluidity and responsiveness.
